title: Ashburn Emergency Maintenance
body:
Upstream has just notified us

Please be advised that emergency network maintenance is scheduled at our Ashburn location to perform an Core router hardware upgrade aimed at improving network redundancy and stability.
Maintenance Window:
 Date: Tuesday, Sept 2, 2025
 Time: 6:00 AM – 10:00 AM PDT
 Duration : - 10-20 Minutes

Expected Impact:
A brief 10–15 minute service interruption may occur during the upgrade process. We will work to minimize downtime and restore services as quickly as possible.
We appreciate your understanding and patience as we implement these enhancements to strengthen our network infrastructure.

We will route around the maintenance for anycast product lines.
